Dead by daylight is a multiplayer 4 vs 1 game that is surprisingly fair. You can take a role as survivor to escape from ruthless killer by helping each other or become selfish one (and you may killed anyway) and escape the place by entering the exit gate, or you can take killer role and hunt down all your prey (this is seriously fun). Both role have completely different gameplay mechanic, so it's like buy two games actually.

PROS :
+Multiple perk for both killer and survivor you can choose, this make the gameplay more variable depending on your playstyle
+Offering system that also can change the gameplay like map or mori (for killer) that make you can control your strategy to the fullest
+Regular update like new map, killer and survivor from developer that still continue and make the game fresh
+Unique skill (that you can modify with add on) for every killer you can choose to suit your playstyle (not all the killer is free tough) and many different items for survivor to help you survive the game, make the game more balance

Cons :
-Optimization... when my laptop can run resident evil 7 on highest set and get 40-60 fps, this game force my laptop to run on low set with 20-50 fps (mostly 30), kinda bad actually
-No dedicated server (for now, because the developer will make it soon), this make the killer become host, and when the killer have bad internet, survivor will suffer lag and often teleport anywhere
-Loading screen bug on survivor, which is happen when joining the lobby (this happen to me like more than 10 times), all you can do to fix this is exit the game and start it again

Well, i can say much about this game yet, because i just play it for 180 hours. Remember that as multiplayer game which is 1 vs 4 this game can be kinda toxic, or even more, the survivor mad to another survivor, but still, not all people like that, so it's depend on it's people. If you want to buy this game and play alone, you may better play as killer and hunt survivor, playing as survivor with random people is kinda hard, that you can't communicate each other, but survive with friend is seriously fun, even if you dead anyway. The game itself is worth the price. And if you want to help the developer, you may buy the DLC that allow you to use another killer or survivor.
Bit glitchly but a good bit of fun with a little skill curve to keep you playing

ttld; I've been a rank one killer for 4 seasons consecutivly, I've played from the beta and upwards. And there is rarely ever a 'fun' match where it's balanced for both sides if you want to play killer, and survivers have to roll a dice on their specilized builds depending on what killer is played. This makes it so games are rarely even out, and for the killer are generally furstrating unless you're face stomping, and then that gets boring very shortly.

 Survivers have problems with facecamping (in lower ranks) and tunneling because of newer game mechanics (looking at you leigon) and gamebreaking killers that ignore certain core rules of the game. But they counter this with meta builds that counter certain meta killers, but this now comes down to a roll of the dice where in "will my build/surviver I play work with my team of three other random survivers, and will it work against the killer if I overspecilize. Making some games where certain builds have almost no chance of working, or others will pubstomp 5 gen before the killer can get a decent hook (depending on the killer)

Now onto the killers side. The side that has major issues, half the killers in the game are worse than trash tier and struggle to get played because their kit is very weak without certain rare addons that would buff them. Once you have these ultra rare addons, it becomes a much easier game with these underpowered killers and you can start to develop specilized biulds similar to the survivers...but now unlikes the survivers, win or loose the game, your addons will always be consumed making keeping a specilized build impossible. I can hook and murder 4 survivers before they even repair a single gen, and loose all my items, or have 3 out of 4 people fail to load into the game, and the last person DC's and also loose the addons I used without actually gaining any points. Now pulling away from this terrible addon system, some killers are made competly irrelivent and extreamly frustrating to play on both a.) certian maps, and b.) against certain surviver builds as I talked about ealier. Not to go into major detail, in the shorter explination alot of killers have a glaring weakness in their kit if they're not meta picks that make them impossible to play, and the top killers like pig, nurse, huntress, and legion, and hillbilly (the newest killer, who only has one specific build that works, but it breaks the game making it impossible for anyone to escape if you know how to play it correctly) have specific builds that shut them down thats all part of a roll of a dice before the game begins.

Because of these 3 points, this game that has alot of fun if played with friends, becomes a hellscape for a killer to play alone, or individual survivers to play in a random stack. (Oh and a 4 stack of players can just use voice coms to make a killers life a living hell making it a fun game for survivers but a horrible game for the killer) But has so many situations where you'll just end up feeling frustrated, with really nothing you can do about it drives me to post a negitive review of the game.

Edit: With the current nerfs to the Nurse, the literal hardest to play killer in the game, making her worse than mid tier even in the hands of a great player, but still requiring a 20+ hour learning curve to even begin to play decently, has lead me to completly uninstall this game and reccommend that literally no one buy this game. The Nurse was DBD first DLC killer and was concidered both the strongest, but hardest to play in the game, and now is just a walking trashbag even in the hands of a skilled player. The Devs of this game have no clue how to gradually nerf or how to properly change a character and just gut killers kits on a whim. Do not pick up this game, do not support these developers, do not give them your money. If I could refund the game at this point I honestly would.

De no ser por sus problemas en el matchmaking DBD sería [b]el[/b] juego que no puede faltar en tu biblioteca. Y aún así creo que debería serlo, ya que dichos problemas serán arreglados dentro de poco con servidores dedicados, añadiendo que puedes jugar sin molestia alguna en horarios nocturnos donde el juego es bastante concurrido (para Latinoamérica). Recomendado. 7/10 (aunque después de la actualización del sistema de matchmaking de seguro será un 10/10).

黎明杀机刚发售的时候就开始玩了，弃坑许久最近回坑的我倒也是有一些自己的想法。
“I think we did pretty good job so far”
我们都知道游戏或多或少对新人玩家都不太友好，但是黎明杀机给我的感觉就是更加严重，新人需要足够长的时间培养技能和熟悉地图（希望给新人快速追赶的机制或任务），并且建议低段位匹配机制优先先从玩家等级而不是rank段位开始（比如说20段-16段，先从等级相似的玩家开始匹配），日常任务让我没有做的欲望，有些低技能点数角色的任务碰都不想碰，对于我这种不爱玩屠夫的玩家，屠夫每日也不想碰，建议简化分开，让玩家对每日任务进行选择，2选1，生存者便全是关于生存者的日常，屠夫亦之。

几个关键的点放在首先，现在我想谈谈我为什么喜欢并还是很推荐这款游戏，一款画质和风格都十分不错的游戏（即便是现在出了或多或少鲜艳皮肤，但也大体解释的通）我能相信新人从游戏中感受惊悚紧张的游戏体验（虽说玩的越久大家也越轻松什么的hmmmm），游戏很多种类成功逃生的玩法，很多有意思的配合（这里说一点，这个游戏氛围还是非常不错的，极大多数情况下，电闸开门了都不会对勾上队友不管不顾，除非遇到守尸真救不了的情况），地图也足够丰富，随机板区和物品位置让玩家每次都有不一样的体验，求生者也有更多丰富的技能搭配更多玩法。
С багами этой игры не соскучиться.

이 게임은 발전기 연애 시뮬레이션입니다.

살벌한 살모님들을 피해서 몰래 발전기들과 사랑을 주고받아야 하며, 잘못될경우 화가난 발전기가 살모님들께 고자질하게됩니다.
몸의 대화로 살모님과 덕담을 나눌수도있고.
그러다가 살모님의 식사대접에 하늘로 승천할수도있으니 조심하셔야 합니다!
일정숫자의 히로인 발전기들을 모두 공략할경우, 사랑의도피라는 선택지가 생기게되며, 분노한 살모님들을 피해 달아나시면 됩니다!

I knew this game from watching 2Bro. Entertainment's Dead by Daylight gameplays, and they got me hooked. 

I'm glad that dedicated servers are coming up soon this year, because the matching system isn't really good now. People disconnecting left and right from high ping or sudden lagness in-game really ruins the match. Overall, this game is most fun when surviving with friends, but it's also fun surviving with randoms (provided they are not toxic).
Such a good game!

Probably the most incompetent developers I've ever seen. They ignore actual game-breaking issues in the game to push out more paid DLC characters.  Very unbalanced. Hitboxes are broken. Game crashes too much. Some perks are godawful and don't get buffed. Killer lobbies have been broken for longer over a year. The game becomes repetitive after a while. Pretty poorly optimized. If you play killer you get the most god awful toxic surviors I've ever seen, like they trash talk in end game chat and also say stupid/racist stuff on your profile...

Please I beg you to not choose this self harm of a game, and the devs don't care about your opinion they just care about more ways to get money. They only take opinions of the people that don't understand the game. If they actually cared to do something to balance the game out, it would be so much better.

like there could be (2 killers-10 survivors- survive 5 min-slaughter) kinda short side-games.

Здравствуйте, передайте разработчику игры, что он харош. Я искал лобби 50 минут. Мы с другом присоединились , и началось, 1 урод подключился, вышел, вторая мразь зашла, вышла. И так 50 минут (без преувеличения). После того как мы все же смогли найти игру. Попался еб@ан на Бубе с инсидиусом, ноедом, и мементо, который стоял всю игру возле друга. Я нашёл ключ, нашел люк, сбежал. И получил -1 каплю. Спасибо за то, что стараетесь над игрой.
Разбирайте, ибо не зря же я это сюда писал...

Итак,наиграв достаточное кол-во часов в эту игру,могу сказать пару слов о ней.
Игра получилась весьма интересная,да не без косяков,но играть можно,это пожалуй первый и единственный плюс,теперь о минусах,игра не сбалансированная абсалютно,подбор игров осуществляется по кол-ву хромосом,а не по уровню и часам в игре,даже на высоких рангах попадаются абсолютные аутисты,еще могу сказать,что разработчики благополучно забили болт на свою игру,система банов и жалоб не работает впринципе,они лишь выпускают новые не сбалансированные длс по типу Легиона,все те же лаги их вообще не смущают,чат не работает для русского языка уже как месяц и им все же насрать.
Рекомендовал бы ли я эту игру?
Решайте сами,для фана на низких рангах вполне вменяемая,а для достижения более высоких рангов,готовьтесь понервнячать и как по мне это того не стоит

このゲームは非対称型と呼ばれるもので一般的な対戦ゲームと違い、片方のチームともう一方のチームのパワーバランスと目的に違いがあります。

このゲームは生存者（サバイバー）と殺人鬼（キラー）の２つのチームがあり、生存者は発電機を人数+1を修理してエリアから脱出する、殺人鬼は生存者全員を殺すという目的をそれぞれ持っています。

非対称型ゲームというのはアップデートをし続けなければ行けないゲームジャンルなのでバランスが取れていない場合もありますが、そこは非対称型の醍醐味ということで楽しむのが良いのでは無いでしょうか。

また、このゲームを作っているスタジオは大きなところではないので、バグの修正が遅れるのはしょうがないのですが、ゲームエンジンのアップデートや大幅な修正でFPSの低下などが頻繁に起きる場合もあります。

追記
最近始めましたが、未だにゲーム最適化はいい方向へ向かっておりません。

Od czasu kupna gry (5 dni temu) zagrałem już w nią około 50 godzin. Bardzo się ją zacząłem jarać i była po prostu świetna, śmieszna i ciekawa, nigdy mi sie nie nudziła. Po przegranych 50 godzinach mogę uznać że gra nie jest doskonała ponieważ zdarzają się bug'i ale głownie minus tej gry to że jest sporo cheaterów (chodzi głownie o speedhack i ping swapper) na początku gry nie miałem z tym problemem, ale teraz już co 3/4 gry spotykam się z zabójcą który zatrzymuję całą rozgrywke a już po laggu teleportuję się prosto w mojego teammate'a lub w mnie i to jest bardzo irytujące, po za tym gra nie była by doskonała ponieważ sam ping w niej jest nie tak jak powinien być. Jeszcze ani razu nie zdarzyło mi się znaleść zabójcę z mniej niż 60 pingu. Często trafiam na poprostu ludzi z laggami i przez to zacina się cała rozgrywka (ponieważ zabójca jest zawsze hostem gry). Więc moim podsumowaniem gra jest bardzo wciągająca i aż prosi się by w nią grać lecz cheaterzy i lagi (ping) są sporym problemem więc dał bym tej grze 8/10

PROS: In its current state, game is playable, its pretty fun either on survivor or killer, have played this game a long time, and have changed my review from Not recommend to, recommend solo or with friends, can be great solo playing killer, will be frustrating at first, but its a lot harder to play killer then it is to play survivor, overall the game is in a decently playable state there is some obvious balancing issues but for the most part the game overall is fun! I even was harsh for years about their clunky animations for their Mori's which is a way the killer can finish you off by their own hands instead of sacrificing you on the hook, most of them are pretty damn polished and look really clean!
Cons: All the DLC for this game is going to run a hefty price tag if you plan to play as killer and survivor, keep this in mind before committing to it, other cons are trolls, ragequitters, afks, and sometimes you get an absolutely toxic killer IE, Facecamping (puts you on the hook and sits in front of it not allowing anyone near)  Tunneling (chases somone right after they are taken off hook) these behaivours are considered strategies and aren't directly bannable these are frowned upon by most of the community there is other strategies such as Snowballing, or Slugging that work much better for killers however you will still run into the occasional dickbag that wants to sit with a chainsaw in front of the hook after downing someone, not much you can do about it.
10/10 Toxic
10/10 Horror
10/10 Skins
10/10 Trash
10/10 Unbalanced
*Updated 2022* Game is in its worst state its been in for playing killer if your buying this game to play as a killer forget about it, the current meta on survivors makes it really difficult to have a good game, you get toxic flashlight teams that all run the wiggle builds and with the new wiggle mechanic, if they aren't flashlight saving they are wiggling free, and everytime you kick a pallet or try to do any action infront of the survivor expect to be blinded over and over causing you to waste more time on a chase and it buys them more then enough time to get to a pallet and stun you or loop you around it again, personally i stopped respecting pallets entirely because of this and it does nothing regardless whether i respect them or dont, i cant really win chases as much as i use to, And I don't want sacrifice 2 perk slots across the board just to counter the current meta, I.E lightborn and Iron will/grasp could counter these meta perks survivors are using along with the flashlights, but in reality getting these perks on my killers is a lottery with the current teachable system, its honestly disgusting in its current state. RIP killer games, ill be on survivor until they either do something to where we can disable certain teachables on killers because honestly some perks are just downright fucking trash now compared to the the meta perks, but we have to dump MILLIONS AND MILLIONS of blood into our killers after max level just to get the perks we should be running, and i understand its like this for survivors as well, but its much easier to play on an already maxxed out survivor while you max another one, and this is the same for the killers, but GL farming blood once your out of addons at high rank. oh did i mention How fucking trash the matchmaking is  im a Bronze 4 killer right now but my last 4 matches had 1-3 rank 1 iridescent survivors (highest rank attainable)
Conclusion being The game is heavily favoring the survivors, also the queue in survivor is fucking disgusting at times, mostly due to the fact no one wants to play killer anymore, and this is coming from a guy that has every killer max level and a few prestiged.

*BEWARE KILLERS ARE ALL STARTING TO FACECAMP AS THAT IS THE META FOR KILLERS NOW! JUST PLAYED 4 SURVIVOR MATCHES IN A ROW AND WE HAD A FACECAMPER ALL 4 GAMES, BEHAVIOUR, Your going to be the downfall to your own game you encourage the toxic hateful gameplay that makes me want to smash my pc into oblivion *im not normally one to rage* but wow this game really makes me angry, do you guys even play your game? do you see the problems that are sticking out like a sore fucking thumb? GOODLUCK Having new players come play your game in its current state. you either have a facecamper for a killer or you play with a low level killer with no perks against rank 1s that can make you feel like the fat kid in dodgeball lmfao this game is going to die this year mostly due to the fact it doesn't matter how much skill you have on a killer its entirely based on your perks and addons, survivor takes skill to play but is incredibly easy when everyone runs a flashlight with wiggle build. Really cool game. Although you only do the same things all over again, it still doesn't get too repeative. Nice graphic, cool events and modifications. Not as scary as you would imagine a horror game would be (not many scare jumps), but it gets the feeling of a scary place and backstory. A creative new way of multiplayer gaming. Love the efort the developers puts into the game to produce new stuff and DLC characters.

It's so much fun when you play with friends, so get your team together and start playing right away!

É um ótimo jogo para se divertir tanto sozinho quanto com os amigos. Apesar de alguns bugs, continua sendo legal e sempre conta com novidades. Vale a pena comprar!

I originally reviewed this 2 and a half years ago, basically saying "The game is broken, devs won't fix it. They only want to release more and more DLC for cash and that's it"

Since then, I got back into the game. However, the same is still true to this day. The game is still broken, and they still just release DLC for money and nothing else. Only difference is this time the DLC is also broken. BHVR have become comfortable in their fanbase buying anything that they just don't listen anymore, it's just churning out the next thing to buy. I really wouldn't recommend getting in on this train, just stay out of it whilst you can tbh.

Dead by Daylight é um bom jogo para jogar com os amigos, possui uma mecânica simples, porém "inovadora". Há diversos personagens, todos com diferentes tipos de skills. O objetivo dos sobreviventes é simples, restauras 5 geradores, abrir a porta e sair. E do assassino é ainda mais simples, matar os sobreviventes. È bom para jogar casualmente, mas depois de 1 ou 2 partidas começa a enjoar e sentir que não há nada de novo no game. Não é ruim, mas se quiser compre na promoção.

7,5/10

Играть в неё я начала с декабря 2016(это второй акк) и за всё это время я в ней разочаровывалась много раз, уходила и возвращалась – да, всё потому что игра офигенная. 
Атмосфера на высоте, даже яркий шмот не портит, главное самому не выходить за рамки приличия и помнить – вы играете с людьми. Все убийцы интересны, играть за них и против них одно удовольствие, анимация приятна глазу, а некоторые мементо мори захватывают дух. Фигурки выживших так же не отстают – несомненный плюс игры в том, что можно прокачать и гонять с нужными перками на одном. Карты так же передают атмосферу игры, каждая идеально подходит своему убийце.
Касательно минусов… Ну их всего 2 – баги и комьюнити. Баги, которые портят игру, не так часто встречаются, а вот комьюнити, к сожалению, постоянно даёт о себе знать – если умеете абстрагироваться – то вам будет пох на данный минус.
Не хотите портить себе настроение – выходите из чата.
